display_name: Frequency of nightmares, number of episodes per week
description: How often do you have nightmares (frightening dreams)?
calculation: If par_0710=0 then par_0720=par_0700*7, If par_0710=1 then par_0720=par_0700,    If par_0710=2 then par_0720=par_0700/4, If par_0710=3 then par_0720=par_0700/52
